title: Tomtoc Releases Nintendo Switch 2 Version Of Its Popular Form-Fitting Travel Case

description:
EA and developer DICE have been running playtests for the next Battlefield game for several months, but we still don't know much about what's to come. That will change soon, as EA has shared during its May 2025 earnings call that it will fully unveil the next Battlefield this summer.

This announcement will come ahead of Battlefield's launch, which EA states will occur by the end of March 2026. CEO Andrew Wilson further shared that the development of Battlefield remains "on track," and that the company's changes in testing and iteration have allowed it to better prepare for a worldwide deployment.

DICE has periodically shared updates about its areas of focus during Battlefield's development process, such as efforts to improve environment destructibility and weapons balancing. However, specific information about gameplay mechanics, changes from
title: Battlefield 6 Will Be Fully Revealed This Summer, Launching By March 2026

description:
The Edge of Fate is bringing with it a lot of big changes to Destiny 2. From a completely remade armor system to new weapons, new abilities, and a new vehicle to drive there are lots of new toys for Guardians to play with coming to this new expansion. Here's what players can expect in The Edge of Fate.


Matterspark


The Edge of Fate will be launching with a new destination in the form of the planet Kepler, and players will also be able to explore new abilities as well to go along with the new places to explore. There will be three distinct new powers tied to the environments and ways to play around Kepler in the form of Dark Matter powers:- Matterspark, the Relocator Cannon, and
title: All The Major New Destiny 2 Features Revealed: Powers, Weapons, Armor Overhaul, And More

description:
The next Battlefield game is currently in development, and developer DICE has shared that it will be expanding its playtesting program soon. Battlefield Labs, DICE's effort to include players at early stages of the game's multiplayer mode development, will be inviting more people to join testing throughout the month of May.

DICE published an update on X detailing Battlefield Labs progress so far, highlighting that participants have already enabled the developer to increase stability and balance throughout many aspects of the game. Most notably, DICE will shortly be adding new waves of participants to the work in progress, starting with prospective players in North America and Europe and then expanding to Asia later.
title: Battlefield 6 Devs Expanding Playtesting Soon, Share Details On Progress

description:
Leonida awaits...


Rockstar Games released a new trailer for Grand Theft Auto VI out of nowhere, and the gaming world has been buzzing ever since. The three-minute video offers a new look at heroes Jason and Lucia, while also showing a few of the other faces that will be central to the story of this new era of Vice City and the rest of Leonida.

This gallery will break down everything shown in the new GTA 6 trailer, as well as a few potential clues as to what we may
title: GTA 6 Trailer 2 Breakdown: What's Happening In Leonida?

description:
Mike Dailly, one of the designers for the original GTA and a co-founding member of Rockstar North, said Rockstar made the right decision to delay GTA 6 after seeing the upcoming game's most recent trailer. Dailly made the comments on Bluesky, where he also praised the development team for not giving into greed and releasing a game that the studio knew could be improved.

Dailly said Rockstar undoubtedly knew GTA 6 would've sold exceptionally well even if it launched in a less-than-ideal state and called the studio's choice to delay it for extra polish "impressive."

"Now that's more like it," Dailly said in his post. "That environment is lovely, and things are moving much better… Eve
title: Original GTA Designer Mike Dailly Praises Rockstar Delay After New GTA 6 Trailer
Stanley Kubrick's The Shining 1,400-Page Compendium Is Finally Back In Stock

description:
The new Grand Theft Auto VI trailer illuminated many new details about the highly anticipated open-world game, including the fact that main character Jason is absolutely shredded. The trailer opens with a shirtless Jason climbing down off the roof after doing some repairs. A close-up of Jason reveals he's got cannons for arms, a built back, and some impressive chest gains.

But how much can Jason bench? A sequence later in the trailer shows Jason on the beach, throwing up some impressive weight. In the trailer, we see Jason benching what appears to be 275lbs. Using weight plates from the amazingly fictional brand "GAINZ," we can see the outer-most plate is 25lbs. The inner ones look like 45-pound plates, so all of that weight combined with the bar (we are assuming it's the standard 45 pounds)
title: GTA 6's Jason: Does He Even Lift, Bro? Here's How Much He Can Bench

description:
If you're interested in taking the plunge into the world of Monster Hunter, Fanatical has brought back one of its best bundles of the past year for a limited time. The Build Your Own Monster Hunter Bundle lets you get the Steam versions of Monster Hunter World and Rise for only 10 bucks. Fanatical previously offered this bundle last summer and earlier this year in the lead-up to the release of Monster Hunter Wilds. You have until June 2 to snag it this time around.

We'd recommend snagging each game's sprawling expansion, too. You can get the base games as well as Rise's Sunbreak DLC and World's Iceborne DLC for only $18.
title: Grab Two Awesome Monster Hunter Games For Only 10 Bucks
Great New Sci-Fi Horror Novel Is Inspired By Polybius Arcade Urban Legend

description:
This story contains spoilers for HBO's The Last of Us.

In the newest
title: How Much Are Those Fancy Copper Pans From The Last Of Us? A Lot

description:
Show off your skills--and your style--with the Prodigy battle pass.

Apex Legends Season 25: Prodigy is live, and in addition to a new playable Legend and loads of meta changes, the new season has also brought with it a battle pass full of gold-plated, gem-encrusted cosmetics that are guaranteed to make you stand out from the crowd.

But the new season doesn't just mean new content--Prodigy's launch has also unearthed a piece of Apex Legends history: Arenas Mode. The long-awaited return of Arenas m
title: Apex Legends Season 25: All Prodigy Battle Pass Rewards And Free Loot

description:
Lots of Lorcana in the future...


Disney Lorcana has been slowly building steam since it first launched in August 2023, as the trading card game featuring fan favorites and lesser-known classics from Disney's portfolio of characters has appealed to collectors and competitors alike. With the eighth set, Return Of Jafar, completing the game's second year on June 6, Ravensburger has decided to shake things up a bit; today, the company revealed multiple big changes to both collecting Lorcana cards and competing in Lorcana events.

The one-hour livestream, called the "Next Chapter Of Lorcana," unveiled new cards for Reign of Jafar, but also focused on the ninth set, Fabled, which launches this fall. Fabled marks an inflection point for Lorcana competitively, as it will be the first set to feature reprints of cards from previous Lorcana sets--with the
title: Disney Lorcana Next Chapter Livestream: Everything Revealed For The Future Of Lorcana
This Charming Metroid- And Zelda-Inspired Game Is Getting A Physical Release

description:
Grand Theft Auto VI now has a release date and a new trailer, so it's understandable to think that Rockstar Games might have opened preorders for the open-world crime game. For other games, a publisher might begin preorders after confirming a release date and posting a flashy trailer to capitalize on the hype. But no, that's not the case for GTA 6.

Although we now know GTA 6 is set for release on May 26, 2026 for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S, retailers are not yet taking preorders. You should avoid any retailer currently trying to take your money to reserve the game, as it's likely a scam.

Rest assured, when Rockstar announces preorder details for GTA 6, we'll report back with all the details. In ad
title: GTA 6 Preorders Are Not Yet Open

description: The May 2025 lineup of PC games for Humble Choice subscribers has been revealed, and this month, you can look forward to an action game that feels like it came straight out of the PS2 era, spine-tingling horror, and a fantastic game starring a motley crew of pirates.
title: Get This Fun Swashbuckling Game And 7 Others For Just $12 At Humble This Month

description: Bungie has revealed its plans for the next long story arc for Destiny 2. The developers have revealed a "multi-year saga" in the form of the Fate Saga. The beginning of this new chapter of Destiny's story, there will be four expansions to start us off known as the Year of Prophecy.
title: Destiny 2 Fate Saga Roadmap Revealed Into 2026

description:
Stardew Valley is a massively popular farm sim, where you take over your late grandfather's farm as an escape from the overwhelming city life. If you haven't played Stardew Valley before, your options aren't limited, as it can be played on nearly every modern platform, in addition to now having more features like multiplayer that weren't present some years ago. Here's everything you need to know about how to play Stardew Valley.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to play Stardew Valley
  • Does Stardew Valley have cross-play?

How to play Stardew Valley

Stardew Valley is available on nearly every modern and popular platform. This incl
title: How To Play Stardew Valley: Multiplayer And Platforms

description:
Last July, SAG-AFTRA authorized a voice actors strike against the major video game publishers, largely over the issue of AI protections. Nearly 300 days later, that's still the final point of contention between both sides. Now, the publishers have released what they characterize as the "best and last" offer for actors. And the actors have fired back with their counteroffer, all in the court of public opinion.

As noted by Variety, the latest contract proposals between the studios and the actors have found common ground on most of the terms for a new deal. That includes 24% wage increases over the life of the contract. But the two sides' lack of agreement over generative AI continues to prolong the strike.

Audrey Cooling, a spokespers
title: Video Game Voice Actors And Publishers Clash Over "Best And Last" Offer To End The Strike

description:
Destiny 2's next expansion, The Edge of Fate, has been officially revealed by developer Bungie, and it is launching on July 15. Bungie announced the release date in an ongoing livestream showing off what to expect from the expansion.

Bungie also dropped new cinematic trailer that focuses on the character Orin and her past role as the Queen's Emissary. This expansion will emphasize the role of The Nine, a secretive group of supernatural beings that are aligned with the celestial bodies in the Solar System.

We also got first looks at some of the new mechan
title: Destiny 2: The Edge Of Fate Expansion Release Date Revealed

description: During a livestream reveal event for Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate, Bungie announced that it will be introducing World Tiers. These are customizable location difficulties, with varying difficulty and increased rewards.
title: Destiny 2 Will Have Customizable Location Difficulty With Next Expansion
Star Wars Fans Can Save $150 On Lego's 6,187-Piece Razor Crest

description:
World of Warcraft looks to be introducing a new spell for all characters that will set up a campfire and automatically restore their health when out of combat, making having to buy or cook food for healing purposes obsolete.

As spotted by Wowhead on the public-test-realm-build for patch 11.1.7, the spell, Recuperate, restores 150% health over 30 seconds, has no cooldown, and can be used an unlimited number of times. It's similar to the spell that Delve NPC companion Brann Bronzebeard occasionally busts out when players are injured. The spell's healing properties, Wowhead notes, are actually stronger than the best cooking profession foods available, and it can also be used inside dungeons and raids.

It's a nice little addition that in many ways feels overdue.
title: WoW Is Making Having To Eat Food For Health A Thing Of The Past

description:
Welcome to the party


Microsoft is kicking off May with double-digit additions to the Game Pass library. The new wave of titles even includes three day-one releases, with the obvious headliner being Doom: The Dark Ages. The prequel to Doom (2016) looks like a trip to Hell worth taking, featuring all sorts of medieval-fantasy weapons like the new Reaver Chainshot. The FPS from id Software will arrive May 15.

Sandwiched betwe
title: Games Joining Game Pass In May 2025, Including Doom: The Dark Ages

description:
Prior to joining the directors of The Last of Us Season 2, director Kate Herron had already established herself as a helmer on Marvel's Loki and Netflix's Sex Education. Herron's next video-game adaptation will be The Sims movie, which she will direct and co-write. Now, Herron has shared how her time on The Last of Us inspired her work on The Sims.

While speaking with Variety, Herron credited The Last of Us co-showrunners Craig Mazin and Neil Druckmann for giving her the opportunity to helm Season 2, Episode 4, and revealed that her first meeting with the duo over Zoom came while she
title: The Last Of Us Season 2 Director Reveals How The Sims Movie Was Inspired By The Show

description:
GTA 6 is coming next year, and players will return to the neon-lit streets of Vice City when the game arrives in May 2026. The Miami-influenced metropolis has always been a popular location in the GTA franchise, starting with its first appearance in 2002's Grand Theft Auto: Vice City and return in Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories in 2006.

If you're looking to do some digital tourism before GTA 6 launches next year, you can browse through a selection of images below that show off areas like Leonida Keys, Port Gelhorn, and Mount Kalaga. It's still going to be a long wait for GTA 6 to release, so to help pass the time, you can also check out our features on the new chara
title: GTA 6: All Main Locations From Vice City And Beyond

description:
The new GTA 6 trailer that just arrived contains multiple nods to PlayStation. Not only was the footage captured on PlayStation 5, but the trailer itself features what look like DualSense controllers and a stand-in for a PlayStation console.

In a sequence where Lucia gets home and greets Jason, we see two DualSense-like controllers sitting on a glass table, with what looks like a mock PS5 in the background.
title: GTA 6 Trailer Includes PlayStation Controller And Console References

description:
The faces of Vice City


On a random Tuesday morning, with no warning or tease, Rockstar Games dropped the second trailer for Grand Theft Auto VI--the next installment in its ultra-popular action franchise, and perhaps the most anticipated video game in the history of the industry. With this trailer comes another glimpse into GTA VI's version of Vice City, including some of the people we'll be working with--or against--during our stay.

Below is a running list of every main character that appears throughout Grand Theft Auto VI--that we know of so far. The list will be updated with new faces and new info as Rockstar Games provides it, so that once the ga
title: Every Grand Theft Auto 6 Character Revealed (So Far)

description:
Coming May 2026


Rockstar Games originally planned to launch Grand Theft Auto VI in Fall 2025, but on May 2, the company announced that it had delayed the open-world crime game to May 2026. Specifically, the game is lined up to launch on May 26, 2026 for PS5 and Xbox Series X|S.

Then on May 6, Rockstar released a stunning new GTA 6 trailer completely out of the blue.

To help ease the wait for GTA 6 next year, we've compiled dozens of GTA 6 screenshots from the trailers and from Rockstar's official assets.

The images show off GTA 6's setting of Leonida, the fictional state based o
title: GTA 6 - Here Are 115 Screenshots To Ease The Wait Until 2026

description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has reached another impressive milestone, as the game has sold 2 million copies in just 12 days. Developer Sandfall Interactive and publisher Kepler Interactive revealed the news in a social media post, thanking fans for their support thus far. "We've watched in awe as so many of you began your journey. Feeling every step, every emotion, every revelation alongside you. To those just joining us: welcome. Tomorrow comes," the message reads.

The game has also been popular on Steam, and on May 4, it reached a new peak with 145,063 concurrent players (via SteamDB). What makes this even more noteworthy is that Steam only accounts for a portion of the playerbase, as the game is also available through the Epic Games Store and the Xbox storefront for PC, as well as
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Sales Numbers Keep Climbing As More Players Jump Into The RPG

description:
The newest trailer for GTA 6 has arrived. Out of nowhere, Rockstar Games dropped the trailer today, May 6, showing off a new look at the open-world crime game set in Vice City. Rockstar released this trailer just a few days after the company delayed GTA 6 to May 2026.

This is GTA 6's second trailer, following a first trailer that arrived all the way back in December 2023.

Rockstar also released the first official story description for GTA 6, and the story involves main characters Jason Duval and Lucia Caminos getting mixed up in a conspiracy after a heist went wrong.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: GTA 6 Gets Another Trailer Introducing New Characters And Tons More

description: The Backbone One has been the most popular dedicated controller for mobile gaming for several years now. Outside of minor Gen 2 revision that added support for phone cases, the Backbone is the same reliable controller today as it was when it launched in 2020. But starting today, you can choose between the Backbone One and the Backbone Pro.
title: Backbone Pro Is A Larger, More Customizable Version Of The Best Mobile Controller

description:
Former PlayStation boss Shuhei Yoshida has discussed two hot-button issues in the video game industry, sharing his thoughts on rising video game prices and artificial intelligence.

Speaking to PlayStation Inside, Yoshida said he expected video game prices to go up, but he was surprised to see Nintendo be the first-mover in the push to $80 games with Mario Kart World. After Nintendo confirmed a higher price point for the next Mario Kart, Microsoft followed by announcing $80 games, too.

"It was going to happen eventually. We live in contrasting times, where inflation is real and significant, but people expect games that are ever more ambitio
title: Ex-PlayStation Boss Talks $80 Games, Possibility Of $100 GTA 6, And Role Of AI In Game Development

description:
Bethesda has revealed a truly impressive branded accessory for its upcoming game Doom: The Dark Ages--a Harley Davidson Sportster S. The one-of-a-kind custom motorbike is themed around Doom's new dragon Serrat, and will be given away to one lucky Australian fan later this month.

The Sportster S features heaps of decals inspired by Doom: The Dark Ages, but the highlight of the custom motorbike is the dash, built to resemble the dragon Serrat, with the headlight shining out from Serrat's jaws. The bike is covered in glowing red LEDs to complete the effect.

RIDE IN HELL 🔥 Check out this INCREDIBLE custom
title: This Custom Doom Harley Is A Sight To Behold

description:
From Software has released a 10-minute video going deep into the gameplay of Elden Ring Nightreign, its upcoming multiplayer roguelike adventure, which is set to release on May 30 for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC.

Nightreign is structured around a three-day loop, where a group of three Nightfarers are sent into the world of Limveld to hunt down and kill a powerful Nightlord. The world of Limveld is different each time players return from the hub world, presenting new challenges, new enemies to fight, and new biomes to explore.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Gets 10-Minute Gameplay Overview Showing Off Classes And More
